001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.service.tables;
002
003
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.decorators.DecoratorsFactory;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.storage.Storage;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.base.TableField;
007import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.filters.FilterStrategy;
008import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.service.TableService;
009import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.table.sort.SortingStrategy;
010import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebDriver;
011import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.service.fluent.SuperUiServiceFluent;
012import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.service.fluent.UiServiceFluent;
013import io.cyborgcode.roa.validator.core.Assertion;
014import io.qameta.allure.Allure;
015import java.util.Arrays;
016import java.util.List;
017
018import static io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.storage.StorageKeysUi.UI;
019
020/**
021 * Provides fluent methods for interacting with table components in the UI.
022 *
023 * <p>This class offers functionality for reading, inserting, filtering, and sorting table data,
024 * as well as validating table contents.
025 *
026 * @param <T> The type of {@link UiServiceFluent} for chaining fluent methods.
027 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
028 */
029public class TableServiceFluent<T extends UiServiceFluent<?>> {
030
031   private static final String UI_TABLE_CLICKING_ELEMENT_IN_CELL_AT_ROW =
032         "[UI - Table] Clicking element in cell at row: ";
033   private static final String FIELD = ", field: ";
034   private static final String INDEX = ", index: ";
035   private static final String USING_DATA = " using data: ";
036   private static final String UI_TABLE_CLICKING_ELEMENT_IN_CELL_FOR_SEARCH_CRITERIA =
037         "[UI - Table] Clicking element in cell for search criteria: ";
038
039   private final TableService tableService;
040   private final T uiServiceFluent;
041   private final Storage storage;
042   private final SmartWebDriver driver;
043   private final DecoratorsFactory decoratorsFactory = new DecoratorsFactory();
044
045   /**
046    * Constructs a new {@code TableServiceFluent} instance.
047    *
048    * @param uiServiceFluent The UI service instance for fluent chaining.
049    * @param storage         The storage instance for persisting table data.
050    * @param tableService    The table service handling table interactions.
051    * @param webDriver       The smart WebDriver instance.
052    */
053   public TableServiceFluent(T uiServiceFluent, Storage storage, TableService tableService,
054                             SmartWebDriver webDriver) {
055      this.tableService = tableService;
056      this.uiServiceFluent = uiServiceFluent;
057      this.storage = storage;
058      driver = webDriver;
059   }
060
061   /**
062    * Reads the entire table and stores the result in storage.
063    *
064    * @param <K>          The type representing table rows.
065    * @param tableElement The table element to be read.
066    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
067    */
068   public final <K> T readTable(TableElement<?> tableElement) {
069      Allure.step("[UI - Table] Reading the table: " + tableElement);
070      tableElement.before().accept(driver);
071      List<K> rows = tableService.readTable(tableElement.tableType(), tableElement.rowsRepresentationClass());
072      tableElement.after().accept(driver);
073      storage.sub(UI).put(tableElement.enumImpl(), rows);
074      return uiServiceFluent;
075   }
076
077   /**
078    * Reads specific fields from the table and stores the result in storage.
079    *
080    * @param <K>          The type representing table rows.
081    * @param tableElement The table element to be read.
082    * @param fields       The specific fields to read from the table.
083    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
084    */
085   @SafeVarargs
086   public final <K> T readTable(TableElement<?> tableElement, TableField<K>... fields) {
087      Allure.step("[UI - Table] Reading the table with specific fields: " + tableElement);
088      validateArguments(fields[0], tableElement.rowsRepresentationClass());
089      tableElement.before().accept(driver);
090      tableElement.after().accept(driver);
091      storage.sub(UI).put(tableElement.enumImpl(),
092            tableService.readTable(tableElement.tableType(), tableElement.rowsRepresentationClass(), fields));
093      return uiServiceFluent;
094   }
095
096   /**
097    * Reads a range of rows from the table and stores the result in storage.
098    *
099    * @param tableElement The table element to be read.
100    * @param start        The starting row index (inclusive).
101    * @param end          The ending row index (exclusive).
102    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
103    */
104   public final T readTable(TableElement<?> tableElement, int start, int end) {
105      Allure.step("[UI - Table] Reading a range of rows from the table: " + tableElement + " from "
106            + start + " to " + end);
107      tableElement.before().accept(driver);
108      tableElement.after().accept(driver);
109      storage.sub(UI).put(tableElement.enumImpl(), tableService.readTable(tableElement.tableType(), start, end,
110            tableElement.rowsRepresentationClass()));
111      return uiServiceFluent;
112   }
113
114   /**
115    * Reads a specific range of rows from the table with only the specified fields and stores the result in storage.
116    *
117    * @param <K>          The type representing table rows.
118    * @param tableElement The table element to be read.
119    * @param start        The starting row index (inclusive).
120    * @param end          The ending row index (exclusive).
121    * @param fields       The fields to be extracted from the table. If not provided, all fields are retrieved.
122    * @return The fluent UI service instance for method chaining.
123    */
124   @SafeVarargs
125   public final <K> T readTable(TableElement<?> tableElement, int start, int end,
126                                TableField<K>... fields) {
127      Allure.step("[UI - Table] Reading a range of rows with specific fields from the table: " + tableElement
128            + " from " + start + " to " + end);
129      validateArguments(fields[0], tableElement.rowsRepresentationClass());
130      tableElement.before().accept(driver);
131      tableElement.after().accept(driver);
132      storage.sub(UI).put(tableElement.enumImpl(), tableService.readTable(tableElement.tableType(), start, end,
133            tableElement.rowsRepresentationClass(), fields));
134      return uiServiceFluent;
135   }
136
137   /**
138    * Reads a specific row from the table and stores the result in storage.
139    *
140    * @param tableElement The table element to be read.
141    * @param row          The index of the row to read.
142    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
143    */
144   public final T readRow(TableElement<?> tableElement, int row) {
145      Allure.step("[UI - Table] Reading a specific row from the table: " + tableElement + " at row index: " + row);
146      tableElement.before().accept(driver);
147      tableElement.after().accept(driver);
148      storage.sub(UI).put(tableElement.enumImpl(), tableService.readRow(tableElement.tableType(), row,
149            tableElement.rowsRepresentationClass()));
150      return uiServiceFluent;
151   }
152
153   /**
154    * Reads a single row from the table based on the provided search criteria and stores the result in storage.
155    *
156    * @param tableElement   The table element to be read.
157    * @param searchCriteria A list of values that must be matched within the row.
158    * @return The fluent UI service instance for method chaining.
159    */
160   public final T readRow(TableElement<?> tableElement, List<String> searchCriteria) {
161      Allure.step("[UI - Table] Reading a specific row from the table by search criteria: " + tableElement
162            + " with criteria: " + searchCriteria);
163      tableElement.before().accept(driver);
164      tableElement.after().accept(driver);
165      storage.sub(UI).put(tableElement.enumImpl(), tableService.readRow(tableElement.tableType(), searchCriteria,
166            tableElement.rowsRepresentationClass()));
167      return uiServiceFluent;
168   }
169
170   /**
171    * Reads a single row from the table based on the row index and stores the result in storage.
172    *
173    * @param <K>          The type representing the table row.
174    * @param tableElement The table element to be read.
175    * @param row          The row index (1-based index).
176    * @param fields       The fields to be extracted from the row. If not provided, all fields are retrieved.
177    * @return The fluent UI service instance for method chaining.
178    */
179   @SafeVarargs
180   public final <K> T readRow(TableElement<?> tableElement, int row,
181                              TableField<K>... fields) {
182      Allure.step("[UI - Table] Reading a specific row from the table with specific fields: " + tableElement
183            + " at row index: " + row);
184      tableElement.before().accept(driver);
185      tableElement.after().accept(driver);
186      storage.sub(UI).put(tableElement.enumImpl(), tableService.readRow(tableElement.tableType(), row,
187            tableElement.rowsRepresentationClass(), fields));
188      return uiServiceFluent;
189   }
190
191   /**
192    * Reads a row from the table that matches the provided search criteria, retrieving only the specified fields.
193    *
194    * @param <K>            The type representing the table row.
195    * @param tableElement   The table element to be read.
196    * @param searchCriteria A list of values that must be matched within the row.
197    * @param fields         The specific fields to be extracted from the matched row.
198    * @return The fluent UI service instance for method chaining.
199    */
200   @SafeVarargs
201   public final <K> T readRow(TableElement<?> tableElement, List<String> searchCriteria,
202                              TableField<K>... fields) {
203      Allure.step("[UI - Table] Reading a row with search criteria and specific fields: " + tableElement
204            + " with criteria: " + searchCriteria);
205      validateArguments(fields[0], tableElement.rowsRepresentationClass());
206      tableElement.before().accept(driver);
207      tableElement.after().accept(driver);
208      storage.sub(UI).put(tableElement.enumImpl(), tableService.readRow(tableElement.tableType(), searchCriteria,
209            tableElement.rowsRepresentationClass(), fields));
210      return uiServiceFluent;
211   }
212
213   /**
214    * Inserts a value into a table cell based on the row index.
215    *
216    * @param <K>          The type representing table rows.
217    * @param tableElement The table element to insert data into.
218    * @param row          The row index.
219    * @param field        The table field to insert data into.
220    * @param values       The values to insert.
221    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
222    */
223   public final <K> T insertCellValue(TableElement<?> tableElement, int row,
224                                      TableField<K> field, String... values) {
225      Allure.step("[UI - Table] Inserting value into cell in row: " + row + " for field: " + field);
226      validateArguments(field, tableElement.rowsRepresentationClass());
227      tableElement.before().accept(driver);
228      tableService.insertCellValue(tableElement.tableType(), row, tableElement.rowsRepresentationClass(), field, 1,
229            values);
230      tableElement.after().accept(driver);
231      return uiServiceFluent;
232   }
233
234   /**
235    * Inserts values into a specific cell within a row of the table at the given index.
236    *
237    * @param <K>          The type representing the table row.
238    * @param tableElement The table element where the value will be inserted.
239    * @param row          The row index (1-based index).
240    * @param field        The field within the row where the value should be inserted.
241    * @param index        The index of the cell within the row (1-based index).
242    * @param value        The values to be inserted into the specified cell.
243    * @return The fluent UI service instance for method chaining.
244    */
245   public final <K> T insertCellValue(TableElement<?> tableElement, int row,
246                                      TableField<K> field,
247                                      int index, String... value) {
248      Allure.step("[UI - Table] Inserting cell value into row: " + row + FIELD + field + INDEX + index);
249      validateArguments(field, tableElement.rowsRepresentationClass());
250      tableElement.before().accept(driver);
251      tableService.insertCellValue(tableElement.tableType(), row, tableElement.rowsRepresentationClass(), field,
252            index, value);
253      tableElement.after().accept(driver);
254      Allure.step("[UI - Table] Successfully inserted value into cell");
255      return uiServiceFluent;
256   }
257
258   /**
259    * Inserts values into a specific cell in the row that matches the given search criteria.
260    *
261    * @param <K>            The type representing the table row.
262    * @param tableElement   The table element where the value will be inserted.
263    * @param searchCriteria A list of values used to locate the row.
264    * @param field          The field within the row where the values should be inserted.
265    * @param values         The values to be inserted into the specified field.
266    * @return The fluent UI service instance for method chaining.
267    */
268   public final <K> T insertCellValue(TableElement<?> tableElement, List<String> searchCriteria,
269                                      TableField<K> field,
270                                      String... values) {
271      Allure.step("[UI - Table] Inserting cell value for search criteria: " + searchCriteria + FIELD + field);
272      validateArguments(field, tableElement.rowsRepresentationClass());
273      tableElement.before().accept(driver);
274      tableService.insertCellValue(tableElement.tableType(), searchCriteria, tableElement.rowsRepresentationClass(),
275            field, 1, values);
276      tableElement.after().accept(driver);
277      Allure.step("[UI - Table] Successfully inserted value for search criteria");
278      return uiServiceFluent;
279   }
280
281   /**
282    * Inserts values into a specific cell in the row that matches the given search criteria, at the given index.
283    *
284    * @param <K>            The type representing the table row.
285    * @param tableElement   The table element where the value will be inserted.
286    * @param searchCriteria A list of values used to locate the row.
287    * @param field          The field within the row where the values should be inserted.
288    * @param index          The index of the cell within the row (1-based index).
289    * @param values         The values to be inserted into the specified field.
290    * @return The fluent UI service instance for method chaining.
291    */
292   public final <K> T insertCellValue(TableElement<?> tableElement, List<String> searchCriteria,
293                                      TableField<K> field,
294                                      int index, String... values) {
295      Allure.step("[UI - Table] Inserting cell value at index: " + index + " for search criteria: "
296            + searchCriteria + FIELD + field);
297      validateArguments(field, tableElement.rowsRepresentationClass());
298      tableElement.before().accept(driver);
299      tableService.insertCellValue(tableElement.tableType(), searchCriteria, tableElement.rowsRepresentationClass(),
300            field, index, values);
301      tableElement.after().accept(driver);
302      Allure.step("[UI - Table] Successfully inserted value at index");
303      return uiServiceFluent;
304   }
305
306   /**
307    * Inserts a full data object into a specific row in the table at the given index.
308    *
309    * @param <K>          The type representing the table row.
310    * @param tableElement The table element where the data will be inserted.
311    * @param row          The row index (1-based index).
312    * @param data         The object containing values to be inserted into the row.
313    * @return The fluent UI service instance for method chaining.
314    */
315   public final <K> T insertCellValueAsData(TableElement<?> tableElement, int row, K data) {
316      Allure.step("[UI - Table] Inserting data into row: " + row + USING_DATA + data);
317      if (!tableElement.rowsRepresentationClass().equals(data.getClass())) {
318         throw new IllegalArgumentException(
319               "The Data object must be from class: " + tableElement.rowsRepresentationClass());
320      }
321      tableElement.before().accept(driver);
322      tableService.insertCellValue(tableElement.tableType(), row, tableElement.rowsRepresentationClass(), data);
323      tableElement.after().accept(driver);
324      Allure.step("[UI - Table] Successfully inserted data into row");
325      return uiServiceFluent;
326   }
327
328   /**
329    * Inserts a full data object into a row that matches the given search criteria.
330    *
331    * <p>This method finds a row in the table that matches the search criteria and inserts values
332    * into multiple fields based on the provided data object.
333    *
334    * @param <K>            The type representing the table row.
335    * @param tableElement   The table element where the data will be inserted.
336    * @param searchCriteria A list of values used to locate the row.
337    * @param data           The object containing values to be inserted into the row.
338    * @return The fluent UI service instance for method chaining.
339    */
340   public final <K> T insertCellValueAsData(TableElement<?> tableElement, List<String> searchCriteria, K data) {
341      Allure.step("[UI - Table] Inserting data for search criteria: " + searchCriteria + USING_DATA + data);
342      if (!tableElement.rowsRepresentationClass().equals(data.getClass())) {
343         throw new IllegalArgumentException(
344               "The Data object must be from class: " + tableElement.rowsRepresentationClass());
345      }
346      tableElement.before().accept(driver);
347      tableService.insertCellValue(tableElement.tableType(), searchCriteria, tableElement.rowsRepresentationClass(),
348            data);
349      tableElement.after().accept(driver);
350      Allure.step("[UI - Table] Successfully inserted data for search criteria");
351      return uiServiceFluent;
352   }
353
354   /**
355    * Filters a table column based on the specified filtering strategy.
356    *
357    * @param <K>            The type representing table rows.
358    * @param tableElement   The table element to filter.
359    * @param column         The table column field to filter.
360    * @param filterStrategy The filtering strategy to apply.
361    * @param values         The values to filter by.
362    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
363    */
364   public final <K> T filterTable(TableElement<?> tableElement,
365                                  TableField<K> column,
366                                  FilterStrategy filterStrategy, String... values) {
367      Allure.step("[UI - Table] Filtering table using column: " + column + " with strategy: " + filterStrategy
368            + " and values: " + Arrays.toString(values));
369      validateArguments(column, tableElement.rowsRepresentationClass());
370      tableElement.before().accept(driver);
371      tableService.filterTable(tableElement.tableType(), tableElement.rowsRepresentationClass(), column,
372            filterStrategy, values);
373      tableElement.after().accept(driver);
374      Allure.step("[UI - Table] Successfully filtered table");
375      return uiServiceFluent;
376   }
377
378   /**
379    * Sorts a table column based on the specified sorting strategy.
380    *
381    * @param <K>             The type representing table rows.
382    * @param tableElement    The table element to sort.
383    * @param column          The table column field to sort.
384    * @param sortingStrategy The sorting strategy to apply.
385    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
386    */
387   public final <K> T sortTable(TableElement<?> tableElement, TableField<K> column,
388                                SortingStrategy sortingStrategy) {
389      Allure.step("[UI - Table] Sorting table using column: " + column + " with strategy: " + sortingStrategy);
390      validateArguments(column, tableElement.rowsRepresentationClass());
391      tableElement.before().accept(driver);
392      tableService.sortTable(tableElement.tableType(), tableElement.rowsRepresentationClass(), column,
393            sortingStrategy);
394      tableElement.after().accept(driver);
395      Allure.step("[UI - Table] Successfully sorted table");
396      return uiServiceFluent;
397   }
398
399   /**
400    * Clicks an element inside a specific cell within a row of the table at the given index.
401    *
402    * @param <K>          The type representing the table row.
403    * @param tableElement The table element where the action will be performed.
404    * @param row          The row index (1-based index).
405    * @param field        The field within the row that should be clicked.
406    * @return The fluent UI service instance for method chaining.
407    */
408   public final <K> T clickElementInCell(TableElement<?> tableElement, int row,
409                                         TableField<K> field) {
410      Allure.step(UI_TABLE_CLICKING_ELEMENT_IN_CELL_AT_ROW + row + FIELD + field);
411      return insertCellValue(tableElement, row, field);
412   }
413
414   /**
415    * Clicks an element inside a specific cell within a row of the table at the given cell index.
416    *
417    * @param <K>          The type representing the table row.
418    * @param tableElement The table element where the action will be performed.
419    * @param row          The row index (1-based index).
420    * @param field        The field within the row that should be clicked.
421    * @param index        The index of the cell within the row (1-based index).
422    * @return The fluent UI service instance for method chaining.
423    */
424   public final <K> T clickElementInCell(TableElement<?> tableElement, int row, TableField<K> field, int index) {
425      Allure.step(UI_TABLE_CLICKING_ELEMENT_IN_CELL_AT_ROW + row + FIELD + field + INDEX + index);
426      return insertCellValue(tableElement, row, field, index);
427   }
428
429   /**
430    * Clicks an element inside a specific cell in the row that matches the given search criteria.
431    *
432    * @param <K>            The type representing the table row.
433    * @param tableElement   The table element where the action will be performed.
434    * @param searchCriteria A list of values used to locate the row.
435    * @param field          The field within the row that should be clicked.
436    * @return The fluent UI service instance for method chaining.
437    */
438   public final <K> T clickElementInCell(TableElement<?> tableElement, List<String> searchCriteria,
439                                         TableField<K> field) {
440      Allure.step(
441            UI_TABLE_CLICKING_ELEMENT_IN_CELL_FOR_SEARCH_CRITERIA + searchCriteria + FIELD + field);
442      return insertCellValue(tableElement, searchCriteria, field);
443   }
444
445   /**
446    * Clicks an element inside a specific cell in the row that matches the given search criteria at the given index.
447    *
448    * @param <K>            The type representing the table row.
449    * @param tableElement   The table element where the action will be performed.
450    * @param searchCriteria A list of values used to locate the row.
451    * @param field          The field within the row that should be clicked.
452    * @param index          The index of the cell within the row (1-based index).
453    * @return The fluent UI service instance for method chaining.
454    */
455   public final <K> T clickElementInCell(TableElement<?> tableElement, List<String> searchCriteria,
456                                         TableField<K> field, int index) {
457      Allure.step(UI_TABLE_CLICKING_ELEMENT_IN_CELL_FOR_SEARCH_CRITERIA + searchCriteria + FIELD + field
458            + INDEX + index);
459      return insertCellValue(tableElement, searchCriteria, field, index);
460   }
461
462   /**
463    * Clicks an element inside a specific row in the table based on the given data object.
464    *
465    * @param <K>          The type representing the table row.
466    * @param tableElement The table element where the action will be performed.
467    * @param row          The row index (1-based index).
468    * @param data         The object containing values to locate and interact with elements inside the row.
469    * @return The fluent UI service instance for method chaining.
470    */
471   public final <K> T clickElementInCell(TableElement<?> tableElement, int row, K data) {
472      Allure.step(UI_TABLE_CLICKING_ELEMENT_IN_CELL_AT_ROW + row + USING_DATA + data);
473      return insertCellValueAsData(tableElement, row, data);
474   }
475
476   /**
477    * Clicks an element inside a specific row in the table based on the given search criteria and data object.
478    *
479    * @param <K>            The type representing the table row.
480    * @param tableElement   The table element where the action will be performed.
481    * @param searchCriteria A list of values used to locate the row.
482    * @param data           The object containing values to locate and interact with elements inside the row.
483    * @return The fluent UI service instance for method chaining.
484    */
485   public final <K> T clickElementInCell(TableElement<?> tableElement, List<String> searchCriteria, K data) {
486      Allure.step(UI_TABLE_CLICKING_ELEMENT_IN_CELL_FOR_SEARCH_CRITERIA + searchCriteria + USING_DATA + data);
487      return insertCellValueAsData(tableElement, searchCriteria, data);
488   }
489
490   private <K> void validateArguments(TableField<K> field, Class<K> expectedClass) {
491      try {
492         K instance = expectedClass.getDeclaredConstructor().newInstance();
493         field.invoke(instance, null);
494      } catch (Exception e) {
495         throw new IllegalArgumentException("The TableField objects should be from class: " + expectedClass);
496      }
497   }
498
499   /**
500    * Validates the table contents against the given assertions.
501    *
502    * @param tableElement The table element to validate.
503    * @param assertions   The assertions to verify.
504    * @return The fluent UI service instance.
505    */
506   @SuppressWarnings("java:S1854")
507   public T validate(TableElement<?> tableElement, Assertion... assertions) {
508      Allure.step("[UI - Table] Validating table element: " + tableElement + " with assertions: "
509            + Arrays.toString(assertions));
510      Object tableData = storage.sub(UI).get(tableElement.enumImpl(), Object.class);
511      if (tableData == null) {
512         throw new IllegalArgumentException("No table data found for key: " + tableElement.enumImpl());
513      }
514
515      var validationResults = tableService.validate(tableData, assertions);
516      decoratorsFactory.decorate(uiServiceFluent, SuperUiServiceFluent.class)
517            .validation(validationResults);
518
519      Allure.step("[UI - Table] Validation completed for table element");
520      return uiServiceFluent;
521   }
522
523}
524
525
